code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Typography from'@mui/material/Typography';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{setsensordata}from"../features/sensordata";import io from"socket.io-client";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io.connect("http://localhost:4000");function Sensorstatus(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const sensordata=useSelector(state=>state.sensordata.value);const pumpstatus=useSelector(state=>state.switchstate.value);const modedata=useSelector(state=>state.mode.value);const timerdata=useSelector(state=>state.timer.value);useEffect(()=>{const handlesensordata=data=>{dispatch(setsensordata({OHT_Float:data.OHT_Float,UGT_Float:data.UGT_Float}));};socket.on("connected",handlesensordata);socket.on("Sensordata",handlesensordata);return()=>{socket.off("connected",handlesensordata);};},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",children:["Overhead Tank Float Switch  is ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:sensordata.OHT_Float==="ON"?"green":"red"},children:sensordata.OHT_Float})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",children:["Underground Tank Float Switch  is ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:sensordata.UGT_Float==="ON"?"green":"red"},children:sensordata.UGT_Float})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",children:["Timer is ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:timerdata.modestate==="ENABLED"?"red":"green"},children:timerdata.modestate})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",children:["Pump is ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:pumpstatus==="ON"?"red":"green"},children:pumpstatus})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",children:["Plant Mode is ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:modedata.modestate==="AUTO"?"red":"green"},children:modedata.modestate})]})]});}export default Sensorstatus;
